author: pwnh4
content:
Hey everyone, I recently published a post on The Merge to explain how it will work and what the `#TestingTheMerge` community is doing. I used the Merge section of this discord to give an update on the testing effort. If you have any feedback, feel free to reach out!
 https://pwnh4.com/posts/the-merge
